name: Imperial Pilot (V)
Lore: 'Among the Empire''s best pilots. Loyal and fearless. Use superior numbers to overwhelm opponents. Trained under combat conditions. Wear sealed, high-gravity flight suits.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything she pilots. Matching pilot for TIE Avenger. While piloting a TIE: it is maneuver +2, it moves for free, and when this character is just lost, may use 1 Force to place her in Used Pile. Corvettes are deploy +1 here.',
